page.title: 01HODNET VILLAGE
page.content: Hodnet is a North Shropshire village. There are two roads running through it They are the A53 and the A442. It is quite a busy place but it is peaceful There are over two hundred houses in the village. There are two housing estates; one is{The Meadow}where there are 16 bungalows &{The Grove}56 houses There are six special buldings; the Hundred House, Hodnet Hall, the New Rectory, Old Rectory,W.I.Cottage,Lyon Hall and Church.There is also a School and Fire Station. At the moment they are being rebuilt. There are eleven shops in the village. Here is a list of them: There are 3 garages, two antique shops, three grocer shops one Post Office,one Paper shop, one Buchers . There is a{Doctor's Surgery and there is a pub called the Bear Inn.There are over 15 hundred people in the village. Sarah Brookfield 11
